All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState, IViewControl, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class RangeControl
extends ViewControl
implements java.io.Serializable, IPreserveState

This class is a ViewControl with text fields set up for entering and displaying ranges.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getObjectState

public ObjectState getObjectState(boolean isDefault)
This method will get the current values of the state variables for this object. These variables will be wrapped in an ObjectState. Keys will be put in alphabetic order.

Specified by:
